title: Sit Patrick Mahomes and Start David Blough | The Dantasy Football Podcast
description:
We offer up the best and worst daily fantasy bets for the weekend, including Danny Heifetz’s courageous recommendation to sit Patrick Mahomes and start David Blough (2:00). Then we pick our middle-range sweet-spot players and bargain buys of the week before assembling our daily fantasy lineup for Week 15 (24:20).
Hosts: Danny Heifetz, Danny Kelly, and Craig Horlbeck

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
